subject: Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Christof Innerhofer of Italy mastered a bumpy course to win the super-G at the world championships in Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Germany, for his first major title.
snippet: Christof Innerhofer of Italy mastered a bumpy course to win the super-G at the world championships in Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Germany, for his first major title.
